songs.title: Mɛgye wo girl
songs.lyrics:
[Intro, Shatta]

Ah we de gyal dem want..
Eh, Sark Nation yeeh
Ah, S.M, Shatta Wale..
(yea, ah, hehe)
Killbeatz let's go!!

[Verse 1, Sark]

Girl no gye no ho di s3 w'ahy3 ada so
Onnim s3 m'agye me din w) Kwadaso
Mmarima se no p3 nti wasan abaso
Kyer3 no ho kyer3 nipa, wh3 )no mmom, w'apampaso!!
Bellaroma girl, Wh3 no hyehye
Mey3 Tema boy nti mentee whee
Sika k3k3 na wop3 a, bra na b3gye dollar na forgetti totofeefee
Me, m3ma wo cash
Nea me feeli ne wo bobby ne wo nyash
Di m'akyi na me mfilli wo gas
S3 wob3 si dan a, bra na b3gye quarry dust
3nn3, m'anya Korle Gonna girl
M3ma no awhine me ma n'ade no ak) me square
Woy3 barima a, picky wo sika to air
3ny3 sa a, me ne Shatta b3gye wo girl

[Chorus]

M3gye wo girl
Barima kantinka kama woy3 a, M3gye wo girl
S3 menni sika koraa mede me swag b3gye wo girl
S3 mey3 drug anaa mey3 sakawa mede b3gye wo girl
Ko baya gobe baya gobe, mede b3gye wo girl

[Verse 2, Sark]

Dangerous commodity; )baa no w) shape
Poisonous calamity; girls w) Cape
Infectious gravity, straight to your grave
Polygamous entity don't fornicate
)t3 mpoma no akyi b) me kongo as)
Adwae3 b3f) koraa ansa na ensuo at)
Eyi m'am)tuam saa ama pompo ab)
Meh), 3w3 me ho nti mente ap), y3nk)
B)mm) den, fa wo koko b3gye golf
Boys bi dum kanea, me, metu bulb
M'anim din saa no nso m'ameani wo rough
Ayitey b3se3, ebaa e robb

[Bridge, Sark]

Do you wanna move to the groove?
Do you know the things we go do?
You go make I wait for the goods
So you go give it to me make I dey pay for your dues

[Chorus]

[Verse 3, Shatta]

Cyan say how many gyal wey mi got
Cyan say how much money wey mi got
Cyan say mi have everything wey got so mi nah worry about gyal, only this wey mi want
Nuff money wey mi pree like such
No ew) numbo kaa rushy
Shatta Wale ne ebaa b3 do shi
Ma kpokpo l3 y3 Nima ni ebaa kashi
Sarkodie ee
Am3 wei ni w) fee
Nyame aky3de3 ee
Shatta Wale ee..

[Chorus]

[Outro Shatta]

Every girl afi hear mi
Every girl afi bubble and whine yeah
Tell them, say we dey conquer conquer
Sark Nation, S.M fi life, fi life, yeah
M3gye wo girl, me, M3gye wo girl
Woy3 a, Sarkodie se )b3 gye wo girl
Enyenyenyenyenyenyenyenye...
